tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE court_cases (
    case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    case_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    case_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Active',
    filing_date DATE,
    hearing_date DATE,
    judge VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE court_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    case_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    case_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
    case_description TEXT,
    filing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_content TEXT,
    case_id UUID REFERENCES court_cases(case_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE court_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_type VARCHAR(50),
    case_status VARCHAR(50),
    filing_date DATE,
    court_location VARCHAR(100),
    case_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    doc_type VARCHAR(50),
    doc_content TEXT,
    doc_date DATE,
    doc_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE court_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(100),
    user_role VARCHAR(50),
    user_email VARCHAR(100),
    user_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
  doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doc_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  doc_type VARCHAR(50),
  case_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE case_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  lawyer_id INT,
  action_taken TEXT,
  date_action DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (lawyer_id) REFERENCES lawyers(lawyer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CourtCases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(50),
    case_title VARCHAR(100),
    case_description TEXT,
    filing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE LegalDocuments (
    doc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_title VARCHAR(100),
    doc_type VARCHAR(50),
    case_id UUID REFERENCES CourtCases(case_id),
    create_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Judges (
    judge_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(100),
    judge_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Lawyers (
    lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(100),
    lawyer_specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CourtSessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id UUID REFERENCES CourtCases(case_id),
    judge_id UUID REFERENCES Judges(judge_id),
    start_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    end_datetime TIMESTAMP
)
